articles.author: Mihir Vasavda, Vinayakk Mohanarangan, Shivani Naik, Pratyush Raj, Shashank Nair, Amit Kamath
articles.title: Happy New Year: Look where most of India’s medals come from — village & town, under Rs 5-lakh annual income, farmers’ families - The Indian Express
articles.description: Since the record Asian Games haul this October, The Indian Express tracked down all 256 medallists to plot each one’s journey to the podium. Their income, place of origin, education, first break, the numbers tell a story of challenge, change — and enduring ho…
articles.content: Raising a heptathlete daughter was a struggle for a father banking on the earnings of his tiny tea shack in Ballari, Karnataka. That isnt much of an issue for a coffee plantation owner in Coorg whose… [+7454 chars]
